Package arithmea.shared.gematria

Interface Summary
GematriaMethod Interface to define gematria methods.
 

Class Summary
GematriaUtil Utility class for gematria.
ValidationUtil Utility Class to validate input.
 

Enum Summary
CyrillicLetter Enum for current and ancient cyrillic letters.
GreekLetter Enum for current and ancient greek letters.
HebrewLetter Enum for hebrew letters.
HebrewMethod Enum for hebrew gematria methods.
LatinLetter Enum for latin letters with their values in different methods.
LatinMethod Enum for gematria methods that work on a word in latin letters.
